10126000.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「この王都では:

34266.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「先ほど ニコロイ王:

62318.<pipipi_mid>「さあ 目的地に 着いたぜ。\n それじゃ おれっちは:

34250.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「この橋の先は:
Beyond this bridge is the sacred Kamiharmui Castle, home of King Nikoroi! We cannot allow travelers to
enter the castle at this time, so it is better to turn back.

34251.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「この橋の先は:
At the end of this bridge is the sacred Kamiharmui Castle where King Nikoroi resides! Actually, there was
no king until a while ago! No, it's nothing! No, it's nothing! I see you have Proof of Adulthood. I see you
have Proof of Adulthood. I see you are trustworthy. Cross the bridge.

34252.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「待たれよ！！\:
Wait for me! Kamiharmui Castle, where our Lord King Nikoroi resides, is currently experiencing a bit of
trouble. You don't seem to be a bad guy. But between you and me, I can't find the king anywhere. He seems to be
leaving the castle every now and then, but I have no idea where he's getting out of the castle. So, we have placed
strict restrictions on his access to the castle. The king will be back soon. The king will be back soon, so
give him some time.

34253.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「オ オラ 大人:
I'm going to be a soldier in the castle when I grow up. And then I'm going to defeat the ghosts of the
Dream Forest and get a key emblem from Nikoroi-sama. Heh heh.

144247.「ようこそ カミハルムイの料理屋へ！\n このお店は シラナミ財団の傘下で\n:
Welcome to Kamiharmui restaurant! This restaurant is owned and operated by the Shiranami Foundation! Once a
deserted restaurant that only served dango, we now offer a wide variety of dishes thanks to Shiranami's
management policy!

144248.「私は この料理屋の おかみです！\n うちの娘は 小さい頃から\n 自分の意見:
I am the housekeeper of this restaurant! My daughter was a timid girl who could not speak her mind when
she was little, but after Shiranami saved this restaurant, she ran away from home and said she would serve
him! She seems to be really happy now, and is putting her heart and soul into her work, so I am really grateful to
Shiranami!

34254.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「オイラは 風の:

train station in Royal City Kamiharmui and you can come here by train, right? I was fooled! I thought, ''Oh, no, it's
a train station for VIPs only. I guess it's nice to be an elite, isn't it?

34255.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「この王都カミハ:
To the north of Royal City Kamiharmui, there is an old Kamiharmui castle called 'Abandoned Castle'. For us, the Abandoned Castle is a taboo area.
...Recently, strange rumors about the castle have been whispered in the city. We hear that the Minister Cottle is looking for a skilled travelers.
I wonder if it's related to the rumors after all...?

34256.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「まあ いらっし:

34257.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「この辺りの桜は:

34258.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「この王都の 所:
The trees with pale pink flowers that can be seen in many places in the Royal City are the cherry blossoms
that we, Royal City Kamiharmui, are proud of!

34260.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「王族の住まう城:
If you want to enter the castle where royalty resides, you must first be recognized in your homeland. And if

Why won't you let me through? That's right! Anyway, Minister Cottle has ordered us not to let anything
through!

34261.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「お客人よ！ よ:

is seeking the help of a skilled traveler such as yourself. Please listen to what he has to say.

34262.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「なんたる 美し:

architect should visit Royal City Kamiharmui at least once in his life! There was no mistaking these words!

34263.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「さっそく 大:
It seems that the Minister has asked for you immediately. Abandoned Castle is located deep inside the Dream
Forest, just past the north gate. That's right. There is no need for you to accept the truth about the curse
and the curse. It's been 50 years since that castle was abandoned. It's not as if there's anything to be said

34264.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「このところ:
Recently, the castle has been surrounded by more and more monsters, and many soldiers have gone out to

Nikoroi-sama's order.

34265.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「先ほど ニコロ:

34269.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「なにっ 暗黒大:

! I wish you all the best in your journey and I'll be rooting for you all the way!

34291.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「捨てられた城の:
The scholars of the Abandoned Castle are talking happily about the restored sanctuary of the Abandoned Castle. The

34292.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「この王都カミハ:
The food in the Royal City of Kamiharmui is all beautiful and tasty! I feel like I came to this city for

41315.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「よく来てくれま:
Well done for coming . It appears that your ranger level has grown to over 10. I can feel the power
of the spirit filling your body. I would like to entrust you with a ranger association mission, a
rudimentary mission using the ranger's skill Mercy. Did you know that there is a vast forest called Molinara
Forest north of Wind Town Azlan? The mountain cabin at its entrance is the Molinara branch of the Eltona Ranger
Association. I would like you to go there. And from then on, you will follow the instructions of the head of
the branch. In short, you will be affiliated with the Molinarra branch. Although it is a rather remote trip,
the Molinara Forest is one of the largest and richest forest areas in the world. It is an important
conservation target for the association, and a place where excellent rangers are needed. I asked
you to take care of it.

41316.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「エルトナ・レン:
The Eltona Ranger Association Molinara Branch is a mountain cabin located at the entrance to the Molinara Forest,
just north of Wind Town Azlan. The Molinara Forest is one of the largest and richest forests in the world. It
is also one of the most important conservation targets for the association. Your assignment there
will be very meaningful for you as a ranger. Please do your best.

41317.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「モリナラ支部っ:
Speaking of the Molinara branch, Poranpan and Renosu are the branch chairpersons, and Marcha and Yugiri
are the members of the Molinara branch. I wonder what will happen when you join the group with such unique
members. This is quite something to look forward to.

41332.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「聞いたぜ。あん:
I heard. You are the chosen ranger who possesses the spirit of the forest in his body. Hmmm. Even looking at it
this way, you don't look different from other rangers. I'm surprised at how ordinary you are.

41333.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「やあ <pc>:
Hey . How's it going? Are you familiar with the Molinara Branch? Molinara Forest is one of the largest
and most important forest areas in the world. Good luck!

41334.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「モリナラ支部長:
Mr. Poranpan, the Molinara branch manager. If only he didn't make that pun, he would be a friendly and nice
person.

41335.「……ほほう。はるばる モリナラ支部から\n ポランパン支部長の書状を 届けに？:
Oh-ho. All the way from the Molinarra Chapter to deliver a letter from the Poranpan Chapter President? Well,
thank you very much.

41337.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「……なるほど。:
I see. This is indeed a big deal. I understand. I will contact upper management and make arrangements for
reinforcements to reach the Molinara Branch without fail. However, it must have been difficult for them to come
to headquarters from the Molinara Branch. Please accept this.

41338.「これからも がんばってくださいね\n 選ばれし レンジャー <pc>さん。\n:
Keep up the good work, chosen ranger
<pc>. If something happens in
the future, your power may be needed.

41340.<attr><feel_think_lv><end_attr>「ポランパン支部長:
I did receive the letter from the Poranpan branch manager. However, the number of available rangers is
limited. It will take time to gather reinforcements.

41341.「そうですね。とりあえず モリナラ支部へ戻り\n 今しばらくの間 お待ちください:
Yes, that's right. In the meantime, please return to the Molinara branch and wait for a while. We will do our
best to reach out to them.

41342.「そうですね。とりあえず モリナラ支部へ戻り\n 書状は受け取ったと 支部長にお:
Yes, that's right. In the meantime, please return to the Molinara branch and inform the branch chief that you
have received the letter. We will do our best to call for reinforcements.

41392.「<pc>さんが\n 書状を 届けてくださったおかげで\n 援軍の準備が 早急に:
Thanks to 's delivery of the letter, the preparations for reinforcements have been expedited!
The reinforcements have departed for Molinara Forest, and the battle against the logging alliance should
begin soon. Please hurry to the Molinara branch!

41393.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「あたしの知り合:
A ranger I know went to Molinara Forest as a reinforcement. He's a nice guy. If you see him over there, give
him my best regards.

41394.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「おお <pc>:
<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>Oh <pc>. How did the fight
with the logging alliance go?<bw_break>

45130.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「……な なんで:
What the hell? The spirits of the Molinara Forest are so angry that they have all turned into forest monsters?
Anyway, please don't let anyone outside the association know what you just heard. If word of this gets out,
there will be an uproar.

41395.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「森の怒りは 精霊の:
The anger of the forest is the anger of the spirits. The spirits that reside in the trees of Molinara are
trying to keep humans away from the forest. If this continues, the Molinara Forest will become a dead
forest that no one will be able to enter.

41396.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「モリナラ大森林:
We have already heard about the incident in Molinara Forest. We can't help what has happened, but the Eltona
Ranger Association is not going to stand by and let it happen.

41397.「これより 我々は緊急対応に入ります。 \n しばし 時間をいただきますが\n:
We will now begin our emergency response.We will take some time, but when the time is right, we will show
you the way. Yes, when you grow up to a level 25+ ranger, please come back to us again.

41398.「その際は ぜひ 精霊を宿す あなたのチカラを\n お借りしたいのです。レベル２:
In that case, we would like to borrow
the power of your spirit. Please come
here as a ranger of level 25 or above.

41399.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「ちょっと あんた:
Hey, I heard about you. I heard you were in a lot of trouble. Poor thing. I heard that Renosu and Yugiri didn't
survive. It's really a terrible thing, isn't it?

41400.「モリナラ大森林での事件は\n すでに このカミハルムイ本部でも\n つかんでお:
We have already learned of the incident at the Molinara Forest here at Kamiharmui Headquarters. You have
come to this headquarters because you want to know how to appease the wrath of the forest?

41401.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「……おや？ ち:
Oops? I was wrong, wasn't I? But if anyone can do something about it, it is probably only you. If possible, I
would like you to reconsider.

41402.「……やはり そうでしたか。\n ですが その前に あなたには\n やってもらい:
I knew it. But first, there is something I would like you to do. That is to acquire the special technique
Brownie Boost. However, you will need special training in order to acquire this technique. You must defeat
<%sev_que_name0> by <%nev_que_t_num0> to imprint a wild polka rhythm on your body that will reach the fairies! A
good place to do this is Sunset Meadow. This practice is called Spirit's Trial. Would you like to
start the Spirit's Trial?

41403.「……よろしい。\n 試練を受け 妖精たちのポルカを身につけたとき\n 森の怒り:
Good. I'll show you how to calm the
wrath of the forest when you take the
trial and wear the Brownie Boost.

41404.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「……おや？\n:
Hmm? It seems that you have a lot of requests. If that's the case, please go and take care of that first. It's

41405.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「……ふむ。今は:

41406.「森の怒りを鎮めるためには まず\n レンジャーの必殺技 妖精たちのポルカを\n:
In order to appease the wrath of the forest, the ranger must first learn the ranger's special move, the Brownie

must first learn the ranger's special
move, the Brownie Boost.<open_irai><bw_break>

41408.<close_irai>「選ばれし レンジャー <pc>。\n すべては あなた:
<close_irai>Chosen ranger <pc>.

41409.「ついに 妖精たちのポルカを身につけたのか。\n お前が 選ばれし レンジャーで:
You finally wore Brownie Boost. Now I can honestly understand that you are the chosen ranger. Only you can save

41410.「森の怒りを鎮めるための方法……\n その詳細は すでに ポランパン支部長に\n:
How to appease the wrath of the forest, the details of which I have already shared with the Poranpan

41411.「チカラをつけ その時が来たら\n モリナラ支部に 向かってください。:

41412.「モリナラ支部に向かい\n 決戦に そなえてください。:

prepare for a decisive battle.

41413.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「ちょっと あん:

41414.「すぐ モリナラ支部へ行くのです。\n あなたの仲間たちは じんめんじゅ姿のまま:

41416.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「……なんと！:

41417.<if_woman>「ちょっと あんた 聞いたよ！\n あの危険な状態のモリナラ:
Hey, I heard you! You're talking about going into the dangerous Molinara Forest by yourself. Huh? Already done?
Hahaha, as expected of the chosen ranger. She's a woman with a lot of surprises.Hey, I heard you! You're talking about going into the dangerous Molinara Forest by yourself. Huh? Already done?
As expected of the chosen ranger. He's a man with a lot of surprises.

41418.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「よくやってくれ:
Well done . I have received your report on the release of Molinara Forest. It may be fate that
you, the RANGER, existed when such an incident happened. You are indeed the chosen ranger, even if you don't have
a spirit in your body.

41419.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「モリナラ大森林:
It's quite a feat to appease the wrath of the spirits of the Molinara Forest! You are indeed a chosen ranger. The
ranger I know who went to help came back safely from Molinara. He said to thank you for your help.

108525.「こんにちはっ！\n うちのお父さんは 各地の古い本を集めて\n お店をしていま:
Hello! My father collects old books from all over the world and runs a store. But I've hardly ever seen his
books sold. I wonder if it's okay?

108526.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「オッホン。いら:
Oh, yes. Welcome. It's good that you're interested in books. You can browse for free in this store. Take as
much time as you like.

108527.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「こんにちはっ！:
Hello! My father collects old books from all over the world and runs a store. Honoka loves to read books!
There are lots of interesting books here, so please read them too.

108529.『星辰のことわり』という 古い手記だ。\n<br>\n私は 考えていた。自らの周:
It's an old memoir called Seishin no Kotowari. I was thinking. I was thinking about how to clean up and
organize the things around me. To live is to fight against the daily increase of things. In the midst of my anguish,
I suddenly looked up at the night sky. And amidst the twinkling of the stars over thousands of nights, I noticed a
law that has never changed. The stars that move through the heavens with an unchanging relationship to each other.
I tried to apply the technique derived from this law to my favorite pot. After several prototypes, I succeeded:
I constructed an almost infinite space inside the pot. It is, in other words, a small universe. With this pot, all
things can be stored. I call this law derived from the stars in the sky the providence of the stars and dragons.

108530.『桜が原の隠者』という 古びた本だ。\n<br>\nむかしむかし。エルトナ大陸の:
It is an old book titled ''The Hermit of the Cherry Blossom Field. Once upon a time, in the southwest of Eltona
Continent, there lived a hermit in a beautiful field full of wild cherry trees. There lived a hermit who had a
favorite pot. It was a very mysterious pot that never got full, no matter how many times she filled it. Word spread
throughout the country, and people began to ask hermit to store their unwanted or discarded items in the
pot. Hermit was so appreciated for helping people by sealing dangerous cursed items and things damaged by
demon miasma that threatened people's lives in the pot. One day, however, hermit suddenly disappeared, and the
mysterious pot disappeared somewhere, and people began to forget about hermit. It is said that hermit lived
in what is now Royal City Kamiharmui, across from the Church.

112816.古書店には まだ手がかりがあるようだ。\n他の本棚を調べてみよう。:
Looks like used bookshop still has
some clues. Let's check the other
bookshelves.

108531.「オッホン。いらっしゃい。\n 本に興味があるのかい？\n それとも 何か 別の:
Oh, yes. Come in. Are you interested in a book? Or is there something else I can help you with? Hmm. Didn't an
Elf woman named Enju used to come to this store?

108532.<icon_exc>「おお 思いだした。\n エンジュさんなら 確か１０年ほど前:
Oh, I remember now. Enju-san used to come to this store about 10 years ago. Here in Royal City Kamiharmui, a new
capital established 50 years ago, her was researching the time before Kamiharmui became a Royal City. She
was researching about the time before Kamiharmui became a Royal City. She found out that this bustling city used
to be a beautiful cherry blossom field, where a hermit lived alone in an old cabin. Legend has it that
hermit had a mysterious pot that could hold any number of things and used to store all sorts of things in it. I
used to order some old books for her, but she stopped coming to the store before I knew it. If you want to know
more, there should be some books left on the bookshelf there.

108533.「オッホン。１０年ほど前 よく店に来ていた\n エンジュさんは ここ カミハルム:
Mr. Enge, who used to come to my store about 10 years ago, was researching the history of Kamiharmui before it
became the Royal City. Kamiharmui is a new city built 50 years ago. The city, which is now bustling with activity,
used to be a beautiful cherry blossom field, where a hermit lived alone in an old cabin. Legend has it that
hermit had a mysterious pot that could hold any number of things and used to store all sorts of things in it. There
must be some books on her bookshelf that were ordered for her. If you want to know more, look for them.

109063.「こんにちはっ！\n うちのお父さんは 各地の古い本を集めて\n お店をしていま:
Hello! My father collects old books from all over the world and runs a store. Across from Church? I know
Honoka! There is Item Shop!

108534.「オッホン。１０年ほど前 よく店に来ていた\n エンジュさんは ここ カミハルム:
Mr. Enge, who used to come to my store about 10 years ago, was researching the history of Kamiharmui before it
became the Royal City. Kamiharmui is a new city built 50 years ago. The city is now a bustling place, but in the
old days, a hermit lived alone in an old cabin in a beautiful field of cherry blossoms. Legend has it that
the hermit had a mysterious pot in which he used to store various things. There must be some books on her
bookshelf that she ordered for her.

108535.「プクリポのレンジャーを 知らないかって？\n そういわれても プクリポってだけ:
Don't you know who Pukulipo's ranger is? I don't know who Pukulipo is, but I don't know who he is. What? You were
making a cold pun? Tell me that first! What you're looking for is Poranpan, the head of the Molinara branch, isn't
it? He used to work here at the association's headquarters. You can reach the Molinara branch of the
Ranger Association by wagon from the town of Azlan. If you have been in Molinara Forest at least once, you can
go directly to the Ranger Association Branch by wagon.

108536.「こんにちはっ！\n うちのお父さんは 各地の古い本を集めて\n お店をしていま:
Hello! My father collects old books from all over the world and runs a store. But I've never seen most of his
books sold. I wonder if Honoka will read them all first?

108537.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「オッホン。いら:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Oh, yes. Welcome. It's good that
you're interested in books. Take as
much time as you like.

39244.「エルトナ・レンジャー協会の役目は\n この大陸各地の自然を 守ること。\n<b:
The Eltona Ranger Association's mission is to protect nature throughout the continent. Therefore,
any entity that destroys the forest, be it a monster or a human, can be our enemy. Sometimes you will be forced to
make a hard choice. We should at least be prepared for that.

39245.「ここは エルトナ大陸の自然を守る\n レンジャーの砦 エルトナ・レンジャー協会:
This is the headquarters of the Eltona Ranger Association Kamiharmui, a stronghold of the rangers who protect
the nature of the Eltona Continent. Rangers are warriors who protect nature. They fight with weapons such
as bows and boomerang axes, and acquire the skill to borrow the power of nature. Well, this is not relevant
to you right now. But if you want to be a ranger in the future, you should train to be a martial artist and a
thief.

39246.「レンジャー協会は 世界各地に拠点を持つ\n 国際的な組織……って言いたいところ:
The RANGER Association would like to say that it is an international organization with offices all over the
world, but it is actually quite small. There is only this Kamiharmui headquarters and a few branches in
Eltona Continent. The gap between the ideal and the reality is very thick.

39247.「ここは エルトナ大陸の自然を守る\n レンジャーの砦 エルトナ・レンジャー協会:
This is the headquarters of the Eltona Ranger Association Kamiharmui, a stronghold of the rangers who protect
the nature of the Eltona Continent. Rangers are warriors who protect nature. They fight with weapons such
as bows and boomerang axes, and acquire the skill to borrow the power of nature. You seem to have enough
experience as a martial artist and a thief. What do you think? Would you like to become a ranger to protect
nature?

39248.「この大陸の……いえ この世界の自然を\n 守るためには レンジャーの数は\n:
There are too few rangers to protect nature on this continent and in this world. If you have a heart for nature,
please become a ranger.

39249.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「おお 同志よっ:
Oh, comrade! You say you are willing to fight for the preservation of nature! However, ranger is a vocation
only for the chosen ones, and in order to change jobs, you must undergo a certain trial. The ranger has to get a
fruit called Spirit Nut from a monster <%sev_que_name0> that appears in Kamiharmui North. However, it is not
so easy to get Spirit Nut, because it can be obtained only when you succeed in Half-Inch of skill and win the
battle. Now, those who aspire to become a new ranger. Are you willing to take this trial?

39250.「……いいでしょう。\n あなたに 森の精霊の加護があらんことを。:
All right. May the spirits of the
forest bless you.

39251.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「……おや？\n:
Hmm? It seems that you have a lot of requests. If that's the case, please go and take care of that first. It's
not good if you're feeling inadequate.

39252.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「……むう。それ:
Mwah. That is unfortunate. But you can't become a ranger without going through this trial. There are too few
rangers to protect the nature of this continent and the world. If you have a heart for nature, please become a
ranger.

39253.「ああ <pc>さん。\n もしかして 大自然を守るため\n レンジャーを志す気:
Ah . Perhaps you have decided to become a ranger in order to protect Mother Nature? But in order to
do so, you must obtain the Spirit Nut from <%sev_que_name0> that appears in Kamiharmui North. Moreover, Spirit Nut
can be obtained only when you succeed in Half-Inch of skill and win the battle, so it's not so easy. Now,
those who aspire to become a new ranger. Are you willing to take this trial?

39254.「レンジャーに転職するために\n 必要となる 精霊の実には\n 森の精霊のチカラ:
It is said that the power of the spirits of the forest resides in the Spirit Nut, which is necessary to
become a ranger. In ancient times, rangers tried to capture the power of the spirits by eating the nut. That is
the origin of the word ''trial.

39255.「レンジャーに転職するための試練は\n カミハルムイ領北で <%sEV_QUE_:
The trial to get a new job as a ranger
is to get a Spirit Nut from
<%sev_que_name0> at Kamiharmui North.<open_irai><bw_break>

44255.<close_irai>「ただし 精霊の実は 特技のぬすむを成功させ\n 戦闘に:
However, it is not so easy to get Spirit Nut, because it can be obtained only when you succeed in Half-Inch of
skill and win a battle.

39256.「どうやら 無事 精霊の実を\n 手に入れてきたようですね。\n<br>\n「で:
It seems that you have successfully obtained Spirit Nut. However, this is not the end of the trial. The true
purpose of this trial is to eat the Spirit Nut and take in the power of the forest spirit that resides in it.
Only when you have the power of the spirit in your body, can you change your job to become a ranger.

39258.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「そんなに 用心:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>You don't have to be so cautious.
Spirit Nut is quite delicious.

39259.<pc>は 精霊の実をかじり\n飲み込んだ。:
<pc> bit into a Spirit Nut
and swallowed it.

39260.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「よくぞ 試練を:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>You have done a great job on your
trial. Now you can change your job to
ranger.

39261.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「よくぞ 試練を:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Well done for completing the trial.
This is a gift to celebrate your
accomplishment. Please accept it.

39262.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「そして ようこ:
And welcome to the Eltona Ranger Association. Let me welcome you to our association. I would like to tell you
that you will be a member of our association right away, but you are not yet full of the power of the
spirit. Well, after a while, when your ranger level reaches 10 or more, you will have enough spirit power. And if
you learn the skill Mercy, please familiarize yourself with it to some extent. You will need it for your
mission to protect the wilderness.

39263.「エルトナ・レンジャー協会では\n まだ 精霊のチカラを使いこなせていない\n:
The Eltona Ranger Association does not request rangers who have not yet mastered the power of the spirits to

39264.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「そうですね……:
When you grow up and reach a ranger level of 10 or above, you will have enough power of the spirit. Until
